title: Organizational Learning Strategies in the Era of Remote Work: Enhancing Adaptability through Experiences and Insights

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and basic understanding of organizational dynamics
context.additional_context: Learners are general citizens from diverse industries participating with provided digital devices. Share and analyze remote work learning cases through experience-based activities

learning_goals: Learners can describe in detail at least three personal/organizational learning cases that occurred in remote work environments.
Learners can present at least two autonomy- and trust-building strategies for maintaining productivity in non-face-to-face work settings.
Learners can evaluate organizational responses to post-pandemic changes in work methods based on experiential case studies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
